trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> derive.
trans-unit.target: 表示抽象基底類別的類別<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData"></xref>和<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref>衍生。

trans-unit.source: The EncryptedType class represents the abstract base class from which the classes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> derive.
trans-unit.target: EncryptedType 類別表示的抽象基底類別的類別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>衍生。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: These two classes contain the actual encrypted data or key information in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個類別會包含實際的加密的資料或 XML 加密的金鑰資訊。

trans-unit.source: To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use these two derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要符合 XML 加密標準，您應該使用這兩個衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>類別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>

trans-unit.source: This class represents the abstract base class from which the classes <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> derive.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表抽象基底類別的類別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>衍生。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use the two derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要符合 XML 加密標準，您應該使用兩個衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""></xref> child element to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedProperties>" name="<EncryptedProperties>" href=""></xref> element in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> object in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""></xref>的子項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedProperties>" name="<EncryptedProperties>" href=""></xref>在目前的項目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> XML 加密中的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to add `<EncryptionProperty>` child elements to the `<EncryptedProperties>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可用來新增`<EncryptionProperty>`子項目`<EncryptedProperties>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedProperties>` element provides additional information for the `<EncryptedType>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptedProperties>`項目提供其他資訊`<EncryptedType>`項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> value for an instance of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref>的執行個體的值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The `<CipherData>` element is a required element in XML encryption that provides the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: `<CipherData>`項目是中提供的加密的資料的 XML 加密的必要的元素。

trans-unit.source: It must either contain the encrypted octet sequence as the base64-encoded text of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted octet sequence using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它必須包含做為 base64 編碼的文字已加密的八位元序列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>屬性，或提供包含加密的八位元序列使用外部位置的參考<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherReference%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about this element, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>.
trans-unit.target: 如需此元素的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The CipherData property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: CipherData 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Encoding" name="Encoding" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_Encoding" name="Encoding" href=""></xref>屬性<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> XML 加密中的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property describes the encoding of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會描述加密資料的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the encrypted data is a base64-encoded PNG, the encoding could be specified as 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果已加密的資料是 base64 編碼的 PNG，編碼方式無法指定為 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the encoding of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 描述加密資料的編碼方式的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""></xref> element for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""> </xref> XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionMethod>` is an optional element that describes the encryption algorithm applied to the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptionMethod>`是描述套用至加密資料的加密演算法的選擇性元素。

trans-unit.source: If the element is absent, the encryption algorithm must be known by the recipient or decryption will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不存在，必須已知收件者的加密演算法或解密會失敗。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> object that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref>物件，代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionMethod>" name="<EncryptionMethod>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperties>" name="<EncryptionProperties>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperties>" name="<EncryptionProperties>" href=""></xref>中 XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionProperties>` element can contain additional information about the creation of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType> instance, such as a date and time stamp or the serial number of cryptographic hardware used during encryption.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptionProperties>`項目可以包含其他資訊建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>執行個體，例如日期和時間戳記或加密時所使用的密碼編譯硬體序號。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionPropertyCollection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<EncryptedType>` element in XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來輸出`<EncryptedType>`中 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>物件，代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref>中 XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""></xref>屬性<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> XML 加密中的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `Id` attribute is an optional attribute of the `<EncryptedType>` element that provides a standard method for assigning a string identifier to an element within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: `Id`屬性是選擇性屬性`<EncryptedType>`項目，提供標準的方法，來將字串識別項指派給 XML 文件中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A string of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 字串<xref uid="langword_csharp_Id" name="Id" href=""></xref>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets of sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref>中 XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<KeyInfo>` element is an optional element that contains information about the key used to encrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: `<KeyInfo>`項目是選擇性項目，其中包含用來加密資料的金鑰資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Loads XML information into the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: XML 將資訊載入至<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref>中 XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來載入到現有的 XML 項目<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object representing an XML element to use in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>物件，代表 XML 項若要在使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedType>" name="<EncryptedType>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The value provided is .
trans-unit.target: The value provided is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeType" name="MimeType" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_MimeType" name="MimeType" href=""></xref>屬性<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> XML 加密中的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the media type of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 描述加密資料的媒體類型的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""></xref> attribute of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"></xref> instance in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_Type" name="Type" href=""></xref>屬性<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType"> </xref> XML 加密中的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the text form of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 描述加密資料的文字格式的字串。
